bibl.title: Catalogue of the Greek Inscriptions in the Sudan National Museum at Khartoum (I. Khartoum Greek). Photographs by Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI. Preface by Hassan HISSEIN and Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 122.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - Catalogue [Nos 1-83; viiie-xiie siècles, sauf les Nos 77-78, qui sont datables di iiie ou du ive siècle]. - Bibliography. Indices. Concordances.

LAJTAR Adam, Catalogue of the Greek Inscriptions in the Sudan National Museum at Khartoum (I. Khartoum Greek). Photographs by Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI. Preface by Hassan HISSEIN and Wlodzimierz GODLEWSKI. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 122.)
Leuven - Paris - Dudley, MA, Peeters - Departement Oosterse Studies, 2003, 8°, xxviii-265 pp. et 80 pll. ISBN 90-429-1252-9. €95.
